scripts.precoverage: which lcov && which genhtml && lcov --directory build/Release/ --zerocounters
scripts.coverage: npm run test && lcov --directory . --capture --output-file build/coverage.info && lcov --remove build/coverage.info '*boost*' '*googletest*' '*4.9*' --output-file build/coverage.info.cleaned && genhtml -o build/coverage build/coverage.info.cleaned
